TextView.android:text: 8. History of Cardiac, Blood, Malignant or Autoimmune Disorders, Head or Neck Trauma, Past/Family history of stroke
12. Well in the week before presentation

RadioButton.android:text: No opening at any time, no interfering factor
No audible response, no interfering factor
Correctly gives name, place and date
No movement in arms / legs, no interfering factor
Bends arm at elbow, features clearly predominantly abnormal
Bends arm at elbow rapidly but features not predominantly abnormal
Brings hand above clavicle to stimulus on head neck
Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive, flaccid, areflexic
RadioButton.tools:text: Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive

RadioButton.android:text: Complete paralysis of one or both sides
Visual, tactile, auditory, spatial, or personal inattention or extinction to bilateral simultaneous stimulation in one of the sensory modalities
Profound hemi-inattention or hemi-inattention to more than one modality

TextView.android:text: 57. Other neurological signs including involuntary movements, abnomal reflexes orrpapilloedma
